channel.title: introduction on Lisp In The Sky With Diamonds
channel.description: Recent content in introduction on Lisp In The Sky With Diamonds

item.title: Chapter 0 - (when cloud-native lisp)
item.description: I have always enjoyed writing, although I wouldn’t call my self a great writer. Without trying to sound too much of a cliche, writing has always been very therapeutic for me and when I can combine it with various topics related to my real-life, it’s a pretty fun! A while ago I had a pretty good habit of blogging various tech-related topics semi-regularly, but unfortunately, I lost that habit so that’s why I’m trying to resurrect that with this blog.
